definition: Ministry of Revenue in imperial China
a household/door/family
ministry/department/section/part/division/troops/board/classifier for works of literature, films, machines etc
Minister of Revenue (from the Han dynasty onwards)

sentences.english: Normally, the marketing deartment generates leads and the sales deartment follows u.
sentences.chinese: 通常，市場部會隨之產生客戶部和銷售部。

sentences.english: Ministry of Revenue (Hubu), formed in the Tang Dynasty, and took the centre part in the financial system.
sentences.chinese: 最終在唐代形成了以戶部爲中心的新的財政管理模式。

sentences.english: Kobe Bryant goes to see his supervisor in the front office.
sentences.chinese: 一天，科比去見他的客戶部領導。

sentences.english: Minimum 3 years account management experience in an advertising agency.
sentences.chinese: 至少3年廣告公司客戶部工作經驗。

sentences.english: Contact customer service, will be handed over to the customer and sign the approval.
sentences.chinese: 聯繫客戶部，將完稿交於客戶並簽署批准。

sentences.english: But our housekeeping Department has a very good baby- sitting service.
sentences.chinese: 但是我們的客戶部有一項很好的照看嬰兒服務。

sentences.english: Billy Dailey, head of customer relations.
sentences.chinese: 比利戴麗，你們客戶部的頭。

sentences.english: You might ask the housekeeping clerk to mend it for you.
sentences.chinese: 您可以叫客戶部的服務員爲您補上。

sentences.english: Minimum1 years account management experience in an advertising agency.
sentences.chinese: 至少1年廣告公司客戶部工作經驗。

sentences.english: This is Mary Zhang of Customer Service thank you for your patience.
sentences.chinese: 我是客戶部張瑪麗，讓你久等了。

sentences.english: I went to the families of the roadway, where a lot of food, the taste is good.
sentences.chinese: 我去了戶部巷，那裏有很多小喫，味道都很好。

sentences.english: I need to fill you in on what role you will play as the Customer Service Manager.
sentences.chinese: 我需要跟你說明客戶部經理的職責與角色。
